summary: Replaces the star field and nebula with 4k resolution files.
descriptionHtml:
Simple mod, not much to say here.  Replaces the night sky star field and nebula textures with those seen in the screenshots.

You may have to adjust your enbseries.ini starintensity setting under the [SKY] section if the nebula and stars are to bright/dim for you.  Mine looked good between 2.0 to 2.5

If you like these, come back and leave an endorsement.  Hate the textures?  There are others out there and you won't hurt my feelings if you don't use it.

Note about my mods:  I make things to suit my own tastes.  I do not usually consider if it will appeal to the majority of nexus users.  I release them in case others would like to enjoy them.  I welcome critiques, but if you come to the comments to just outright complain about something without offering constructive feedback, i'll just block you from my mods.
author: Dark1Nova
